Meteara: I need no help, merely a voice announcing my arrival. The Vok 
want the keep the Vector intact, but they would not hesitate to give 
me the order to destroy it. It is up to you to tell your kind of the 
possible consequences of their presence here.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> OOC: This is the only thing I learned at the Boston science museum.
> 
> ::Firaxis::
>        He curled up in a ball and allowed the electricity to flow 
over his 
> casing without damaging his internal circuitry.  "Can you give me 
one good 
> reason I should help you?"  He grimaces as scorch marks appear on 
his armor.
